A magical land where everything is made of candy, from the trees to the flowers. The animals are also made of candy and can only eat sweets to survive.
A place where every day is Halloween, and the people are obsessed with collecting candy. They decorate their homes with candy-themed decorations and have candy-themed parties.
A land where the sun always shines and the only food available is candy. The people have adapted to this lifestyle and have developed unique ways of using candy in their daily lives.
A place where candy is used as currency. People can buy and sell goods and services using only candy.
A land where candy is the only source of nutrition. The people have learned to make their own candy from fruits and vegetables, and have developed a unique culture around candy-making.
